item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "Tis better to have loved and lost Than never to have loved at all." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "From there to here, from here to there, funny things are everywhere!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "If you look in the mirror and don't like what you see, you can find out first hand what it's like to be me." -- Gerard Way

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Frank Iero
item.description: "Cameraman: So, did you read Ellen DeGeneres's new book? Frank: Yeah. Cameraman: How was it? Frank: It made me a lesbian. " -- Frank Iero

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "If for one minute you think you're better than a sixteen year old girl in a Green Day t-shirt, you are sorely mistaken. Remember the first time you went to a show and saw your favorite band. You wore their shirt, and sang every word. You didn't know anything about scene politics, haircuts, or what was cool. All you knew was that this music made you feel different from anyone you shared a locker with. Someone finally understood you. This is what music is about." -- Gerard Way

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "Hey, girls, you're beautiful. Don't look at those stupid magazines with sticklike models. Eat healthy and exercise. That's all. Don't let anyone tell you you're not good enough. You're good enough, you are too good. Love your family with all your heart and listen to it. You are gorgeous, whether you're a size 4 or 14. It doesn't matter what you look like on the outside, as long as you're a good person, as long as you respect others. I know it's been told hundreds of times before, but it's true. Hey, girls, you are beautiful." -- Gerard Way

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "I'm not psycho...I just like psychotic things." -- Gerard Way

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "Heroes are ordinary people who make themselves extraordinary." -- Gerard Way

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "Suicide is a serious thing. And if you know anyone who is suicidal, you need to get them help. No one should be in pain. Everyone should love themselves. Like I love you all." -- Gerard Way

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "It erases everything I hate about myself. Nothing can hurt me. I feel completely invincible. I feel like everyone else on that stage is invincible and we're capable of anything. There's no stopping us." -- Gerard Way

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "I want to be a vampire. They're the coolest monsters." -- Gerard Way

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "Let's have a day in the life of Gerard." Going to get coffee! Going to get coffee!' That's all it would be." -- Gerard Way

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "Yeah, obviously we use vampires as a metaphor for something else, something deeper than just the supernatural. But there's just something about the bloodsucking walking dead, that can say so much to people. There are really so many people trying to get control over you on a daily basis and steal your soul in some way, take a part of you.." -- Gerard Way

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "Cigarettes and coffee: an alcoholic's best friend!" -- Gerard Way

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "You speak an infinite deal of nothing." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "My bounty is as boundless as the sea, My love as deep; the more I give to thee, The more I have, for both are infinite." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by Henry van Dyke
item.description: "Time is Too Slow for those who Wait, Too Swift for those who Fear, Too Long for those who Grieve, Too Short for those who Rejoice; But for those who Love, Time is not." -- Henry van Dyke

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "We know what we are, but not what we may be." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by William Shakespear
item.description: "There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so." -- William Shakespear

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Do you bite your thumb at us, sir?" -- William Shakespeare

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by George Santayana
item.description: "The earth has music for those who listen." -- George Santayana

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "He that hath a beard is more than a youth, and he that hath no beard is less than a man. He that is more than a youth is not for me, and he that is less than a man, I am not for him." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: LydieeOmgzz add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Wisely and slow; they stumble that run fast." -- William Shakespeare
